unnormalised: Arre yaar, remembering all those important dates from history class was such a pain! Like, I still mix up when the Quit India Movement started. Was it 8/8/1942 or some other date in August? And don't even get me started on the exact time of the partition on 15/08/1947. So many numbers to remember, bhai! My head used to spin.
normalised: Arre yaar, remembering all those important dates from history class was such a pain! Like, I still mix up when the Quit India Movement started. Was it eighth august nineteen forty two or some other date in August? And don't even get me started on the exact time of the partition on fifteenth august nineteen forty seven. So many numbers to remember, bhai! My head used to spin.
